title: Pixel 2: No audio/inaudible during phone calls, very quiet during recording/video, no voice to text
content:
Over the last couple weeks, my microphone audio has become inaudible, especially during regular cell phone calls. My understanding is that the people I phone can not hear me at all. When taking a Recording or a Video, the audio is extremely faint when played back despite speaking at a normal volume. My voice-to-text feature either does not function at all, or there is a significant delay and only the last few words are captured.

I have tried cleaning the physical microphones at the top and bottom. My phone has been restarted multiple times. My cell provider was also unable to fix the issue.
